learning.unsupervised.outliers

Class IterativeClusteringOutlierDetection

  • java.lang.Object
    • learning.unsupervised.outliers.OutlierDetector
      • learning.unsupervised.outliers.IterativeClusteringOutlierDetection

  • public class IterativeClusteringOutlierDetection
extends OutlierDetector
    This method searches for outliers as objects that are often associated with small clusters. Of course, the results depend on many things, like the choice of clustering method, the number of clusters and, consequently , what is considered 'small', given the size of the data and the number of clusters.
